articles.title: Jason Statham looks dapper at the 25th Shanghai International Film Festival opening ceremony - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Hollywood actor, 55, opted for a slick black suit with a white shirt and satin bow tie as he walked the red carpet at the event.
articles.content:
